name: RootScape
description: In this bullet hell video game, players control a kid who must defeat numbers by square and cube rooting them. With a variety of weapons and abilities at their disposal, players must navigate a barrage of mathematical obstacles and enemy numbers to save the world from numeric chaos. With fast-paced action and challenging gameplay, "Root scape" is the ultimate test of math skills and gaming prowess. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate number wrangler?
